1.「俺は 魔獣をあやつり 世界に恐怖と混乱を| もたらした……。弁解の余地もない。: I wielded a hexenbiest, and I brought fear|and chaos to the world... There is no|excuse...

128.ワグミカは 超苦い薬を クチに放り込み|甘々シロップで 飲み下した。: Waghmika threw a very bitter pill in his|mouth and swallowed it with a sweet syrup...

130.そして 手のふるえが おさまると|ワグミカは 錬金釜の前に立ち|難なく 地脈の結: And when his hands stopped shaking, Waghmika|stood before the alchemy cauldron and|effortlessly completed the vein crystals!

131.「見苦しいところを お見せしました。| こちらが ご所望の地脈の結晶です。: I'm sorry to show you this... This is the|connection to the vein you wanted...

I don't know what you're using it for, but|it's a dangerous tool that sucks up energy|from the earth's veins. I would never use it|
|improperly.

135.「あっ <cs_pchero>さん！| 待ってましたよぅ！: oh!<cs_pchero>Oh! I've been waiting for you!

|underneath here...

140.<cs_pchero>は 地脈の結晶を|ディアンジに渡した。: <cs_pchero>"The crystals in the veins of the earth...

141.「今から その元凶を おびき寄せます。| な～に どんな化け物が 飛び出してこよ: I'm going to lure that thing out of there...|No matter what kind of monster pops out, I'm|prepared... Watch this!

142.「今ここにあるのは 地底のエサ場の| ３倍に相当する量の 地脈エネルギーなんです:
What we've got here is three times the amount|of geological energy as the bait stations|beneath the earth. He's gonna bite off more|
|than he's gonna feed.

143.「さあ 食いしん坊さん！| こっちに もっと も～っと| おいしいエサが ありま: Come on, gourmand! There's even more|delicious food over here.

144.「ひぃぃぃっ！！| こいつは とんでもない大物ですよぅ！: Heey! He's a big boy, isn't he?

145.「でも 大丈夫ですよぉ。| ちゃ～んと 奥の手を 用意してますからねっ！: But don't worry... I've got a few tricks up|my sleeve!

148.「そうですよぅ！ ヨンゲ所長の飼っていた| 魔法生物の メガロダイン…………ん？: That's right! Director Yonge's magical|creature, Megalodyne... Hmm?

149.「ひっ ひぇええええええっ！| どどど どおしましょうぉおおお！！| そそ 想定: No, no, no, no, no, no! Oh, no, no, no, no!|Yes, this is unexpected!

150.「こうなったら いったん 引き返して| 援軍を呼んでくるしか……。: We'll have to turn back and get|reinforcements...

Hahahaha... But I can't believe Lady Merryde|would fight... If Lady Quorde finds out... If|she finds out, she'll be so worried, she|
|might get angry.

The geological energy in the earth's veins|has been depleted, and the ground in the|greater Etaine area has become unstable... I|
|think that's what caused the quake.

158.「今 未来が変わったキュ！| どうやら この島が水没する未来を| 回避できたみた: Now the future has changed! It seems we've|averted a future where this island is|submerged!

159.「ディアンジー！ 王都へ戻りましょう！| クオードが 吉報を待ってるわー。: Dianji! We must return to King's Landing!|Quorde is waiting for good news...

161.「そのカオ……どうやら 水没の元凶を| 倒してくれたようだな。| ザグルフの直感: That cao... Apparently, he's taken out the|culprit behind the flooding. Zaghlov's|instincts were right.

165.「ご報告の手間が はぶけたようですね。: I think I've saved you the trouble of|reporting...

168.「礼を言う お前たち。| エテーネの滅びは 無事 回避できた！: Thank you, my dear... The destruction of|Etaine has been averted!

171.「そして ディアンジ。計画に必要な| 数々の錬成物を よくぞ そろえてくれた。|: And, Di... I'm so proud of you... I am|truly...

172.「私なぞ たいしたことは してませんよぅ。| そもそも 自力では 地脈の結晶を錬: I haven't done much myself... I couldn't|smelt the vein crystals on my own to begin|with.<pc> I've been relying on you...

173.「自分の至らないところを 素直に認め| 人を頼ってでも 成果をあげようとした。|:
You're willing to admit when you're not up to|par, and you're willing to rely on others to|get things done. I appreciate your|
|flexibility...

174.「うおーん うおーん。クオード様ぁ～！！ | そんな言葉を かけてもらえるなんて: Uh-oh. Uh... Mr. Quord! I'm so touched to|hear you say that...

175.「それから……<pc>に 姉さん。| こんな俺の言葉を 信じてくれて ありがとう: And then<pc> I... Thank you for believing me when I|said...

My father was so dependent on the Box of Time|and Vision... We averted the destruction that|the Dominus could not, but we did it on our|

181.「このカギを 覚えているか <pc>。| いにしえの時代に封じられた マデ神殿の: Do you remember this key?<pc> . The door to the temple of Madé, sealed in|the days of old, can be unlocked with this|key...

182.「こいつは 王家の秘奥に通ずるための| 王たる者の証。マデ神殿も また……| 秘: This is the king's way to the inner|sanctum... The Temple of the Madee is also...|It's one of the secrets...

184.「ティプローネ高地の 北西にある| マデ神殿の扉を 開きにいくぞ。: To open the door to the Temple of the Madhes,|northwest of the Tipulone Highlands...

186.「幾度となく あなたを 導いてきたけれど| いつもいつも 思わせぶりなことしか|: I know I've led you astray many times, but|I'm sorry I've always been so coy with you.

187.「決定的なことを 伝えてしまうと| 正しい未来への道筋が 閉ざされてしまうかも|: If I tell you anything definitive, it might|close off the path to the right future...

193.「……命に代えても 成功させてみせるわ。| それが 王家に生まれた者の つとめだ: ... I will succeed even if it costs me my|life. That's what it takes to be born into a|royal family.

194.「ふたりとも さようなら。| 願わくば 私たちの選ぶ道が| 正しき未来へと つな: Goodbye, both of you. Hopefully, the path we|choose will lead us to a just future...

195.「キュロノスを倒して| 滅びの未来を 回避できたなら……| ボクたちは きっと: If we can defeat Cyronos and avert the future|of destruction... We will be reunited!

196.「<pc>を 信じるキュ！| ボクたちは 必ず キュロノスを倒すキュ！: <pc> I believe in you! We must defeat Quronos!

199.「メレアーデにならって ボクたちも| なすべきことを まっとうするキュ！| 永久: We'll follow Mareade's lead and do what we|have to do! We're going to King's Landing to|set the Wheel of Time in motion!

202.「魔物ッ！ いや 魔法生物か！？: A demon! No, a magical creature!

203.「やれやれ……。| 建国の祖の一角たる 偉人を相手に| 無礼きわまりない奴だキュ: Well, well, well. You're so rude to one of|the founding fathers of our country, such a|great man.

205.「キュレクス…………だと？| つくなら もう少し ましなウソをつけ。| ７００年: Curlew... Really? If you're going to lie, you|might as well do it right. A man of history,|over 700 years old...

|generation... You're the 50th.

211.「それにしても おもしろい姉弟だキュレ～。| 時渡りで 別々の時代へ流され それ: Interesting siblings, Ki... They were|transported through time to different eras,|and spent their time in different places.

212.「なるほど。姉と弟で 生体継続時間が| 逆転してるのも 納得キュレ。: Yeah... It makes sense that the sister and|brother's bio-duration would be reversed...

214.「そう言ってるキュレ。いい機会だから| 祖先に 都合のいい歴史を吹き込まれた|:
That's what he says... It's a good|opportunity for me to teach you, who have|been fed a false history by your ancestors,|
|the real history...

215.「そもそも お前たちが宿す 時渡りのチカラは| 私が 朋友レトリウスに 分けあた:
In the first place, the power of time travel|that you possess was passed down from|generation to generation from the power I|
|shared with my friend Retrius...

216.「しかし 私は……人間を 見誤ったキュレ。| レトリウスが いかに 高潔な人物で: But I... I misjudged the human race. However|noble Letorius may have been... it does not|follow that his descendants will be the same.

217.「人間とは 世代をかさねる 生き物だと| 当時の私は 理解していなかったキュレ～: At the time, I didn't understand that humans|are a generational creature.

218.「エテーネを築いた レトリウスは とっとと| 死んでいったキュレ……。残された:
Letelius, the builder of Etaine, died|quickly, leaving the curé... His surviving|children and grandchildren turned to me to|
|see the future of their kingdom...

219.「そうして エテーネ王国は 私の時見を活用し| 自然災害や 飢饉による危機を回避: And so the Kingdom of Etaine, averting the|dangers of natural disaster and famine with|the help of my insight, prospered...

220.「しかし 最初こそ 神のごとく敬っていた私を| 祭司たち……レトリウスの子孫は: But the priests... who at first revered me as|a god... The descendants of Letorius... will|do as they please. I was a fool...

221.「当時の祭司長は 錬金術で作った道具をもちいて| 私から 時見の源泉を奪った挙句:
The chief priest at the time used an|alchemical device to deprive me of the|wellspring of time vision and then sealed me|
|away in the Temple of the Madhes...

222.「その後 彼らは 私のチカラの源から| 物言わぬ 時見の能力だけを持った存在を|:
After that, they created a being from the|source of my power, a being with nothing but|the ability to see time, and they put it in|
|that box...

224.「ご名答。そして 時見の箱と交信できるのは| 時渡りのチカラを 受け継ぐ| 建国:
... And only those of the line of the|founding king Letorius, who inherited the|power of time travel... can communicate with|
|the box.

225.「私たちの祖先が そんな ひどいことを| おこなっていたなんて……。: I can't believe our ancestors did such|terrible things.

226.「返せるものなら その 時見の源泉を| お返ししたいのですが……王宮が消えた|: If I could, I would give you back the source|of your vision. Now that the palace is gone,|it may be lost...

227.「いいや まだ 存在しているキュレ。| この島の どこかから かつて私の一部だっ:
No, it's still here. Somewhere on this|island, I can feel the vibrations of the|source that was once part of me, the source|
|of Tokimi.

228.「奪われた 時見の源泉は お前たちの| 言葉でいうと 球根みたいな形をしてるキュ: The source of the stolen tokimi is shaped|like a bulb, in your words... Does this mean|anything to you, Curé?

230.「前に <pc>と 王家の温室に行ったとき| 目にした 巨大な球根！| あれが: before<pc> And when I went to the Royal Conservatory, I|saw this giant bulb! Could that be the source|of Mr. Curlew's vision?

231.「もし 時見の源泉を 返してくれたなら| お前たちが 行きたがっている| 時獄の: If you return the wellspring of time travel|to me, I will allow you to travel to the|labyrinth of time travel you so desire...

232.「きっと まちがいないわ！| 軍区画の転送の門から| 王家の温室に 行ってみまし: There's no doubt about it! We'll go through|the transfer gate in the military section to|the royal conservatory...

233.「おお……なつかしい この波動。| まごうことなき 時見の源泉キュレね。: Oh... It's so long ago... The unmistakable|fountainhead of Tokimi...

234.「奪われていたものを 返されて| 礼を言うのも おかしな話キュレ。: It's funny how you thank someone for giving|you back something that was taken from you...

235.「けれど 時見の源泉を奪ったのは| 遠い祖先のしわざで お前たちではないキュレ。: But it was our distant ancestors who stole|the source of Tokimi, not you... I'll just|say thank you...

238.「ブフィ～。ひさかたぶりに 真の姿を| 取り戻したキュレ！| かつてない 高ぶり: B... For the first time in a long time,|you've regained your true form! I feel more|alive than I've ever felt before!

239.「キュ～レ♪ キュレキュレ♪ キュ～レキュレ♪| ７００年ぶりの時見を ためして: Curé, curé, curé, curé, curé, curé, curé,|curé, curé, curé, curé, curé...

240.「キュレェ～ッ！ 見える！ 時が見える！！: Currahee! I see it! I see time!

241.「エテーネ王国は……間もなく……滅びる……。: The Kingdom of Etaine... Soon... Will be|destroyed...

242.「な…何を言っているッ！？: What the... What are you talking about?

243.「どういうことですか？| 水没による滅亡なら 回避したはずです！: What do you mean? If it was submerged, we|would have avoided it!

244.「お前たちは ７００年の 長きにわたり| 時見を くり返してきた……。: For 700 years, you've been watching the|clock...

245.「大津波 大飢饉 水没……| さまざまな災厄を 避けてきたが| それは 運命を歪: The Great Tsunami, the Famine, the Flood...|We have avoided many calamities, but that|only distorts our destiny...

246.「運命を変える……その度に 歪みは増大し| 回避した幾多の災厄は 束ねられ| よ: Change fate... Each time, the distortions|increase, and the many disasters averted are|bound together to form a greater evil.

249.「見てのとおり 隕石の落下で 滅ぶ未来キュレ。| 王都を守る 守護障壁があろうと:
As you can see, the future will be destroyed|by a meteorite fall. Even if there is a|protective barrier to protect the city, there|
|is no way to prevent it.

250.「ふざけるなッ！ 俺たちのやったことが| 無意味だったとでも 言うのかッ！？: This is bullshit! Are you saying that what we|did was pointless?

251.「この ペテン師めッ！| どうせ 妖しげな術で 幻覚を見せただけだ！| お前の時: You impostor! For all I know, you've just|conjured a vision with your sorcery! Who|would believe your visions?

253.「……やれやれ。せっかちな奴だキュレ。| でも お前たちは 動じていないキュレね: ... He's... You're impatient... But you guys|don't seem upset.

254.「あなたが 真の時見の使い手なら| 隕石による滅びをも 回避する未来を| 見せら: If you are a true seer, you can show us a|future where we can avoid the destruction of|the meteorite. Isn't that right?

255.「たとえ 回避したそばから 次の滅びが| おそってきたとしても……私たちは 黙っ: Even if we avoid it and the next one comes|along... We can't just sit back and let it|happen.

256.「ブッフォオオオオーッ！！| キモのすわった 奴だキュレ。お前からは| 確かに: Boo-hoo-hoo-hoo! You're a nasty piece of|work. I can feel the blood of Letrius in your|veins.

257.「そんな お前には 隕石落下を阻止する| とっておきの秘策を さずけてやるキュレ: I'll give you a secret plan to stop the|meteorite from falling...

259.「王都キィンベルの 中央広場には| 永久時環と名付けられた 砂時計のような| 建:
Did you know that in the central square of|King's Landing Kymber, there's an hourglass-|shaped structure called the Ring of Eternal|
|Time?

260.「永久時環は ただの芸術作品ではないキュレ。| 空中に散らばる 微量な時渡りのチ:
The perpetual time circle is not just a work|of art. It's a device capable of extracting|and replenishing the power of time travel in|
|minute amounts scattered throughout the air.

261.「かつて レトリウスと 腹心のユマテルという| 錬金術師が 子孫が起こすであろう: It was once built by an alchemist named|Eumater, who foresaw the misfortunes that|would befall his descendants.

262.「……あいつらは たいした知恵者だったキュレ。| 永久時環を用いれば 隕石という: ... They were very wise. With the perpetual|time ring, even a meteorite can be a|disaster.

263.「ただし 永久時環を 起動させるには| レトリウスの血をひく者……: However, in order to activate the perpetual motion ring| The blood of Letorius

If you leave here and follow the pathway to|your right, you will reach a place called the|sacristy, where the wisdom of the Madhes|
|rests...

265.「まず 祭具棟へ行って 花のリストレットを探し| それを身につけて 戻ってくるキ:
First, you go to the sacristy, you find a|floral wristlet, you put it on, and you come|back... I'll tell you the rest of the story,|
|and then we'll...

266.「おお！ 戻ってきたキュレね。| 花のリストレットは 見つけたキュレ？: Oh! You're back, Ki... Did you find the|floral wristlet, Cyril?

267.「さっそく 永久時環の起動法を| 伝授するキュレ。もっと そばに来るキュレ。: I'm gonna start teaching you how to activate|the perpetual motion ring... Come closer.

268.「脳に直接 大量の情報を送るから| ちょ～っと 具合が 悪くなるかもしれないけど: It sends a lot of information directly to|your brain, so you might feel a little sick,|but just hang in there and be patient!

270.「……私が チカラを取り戻したのを| キュロノスに 感知されたようキュレ。: I think... I think Cyronos sensed that I had|regained my strength.

271.「私は 正しき時の流れの 守護者。: I am the righteousness of time...

272.「来たるべき未来を さまたげんとする者よ。| キュロノスの裁きを 受けよ！: The future that is to come is at stake. Let|Cyronos judge you!

273.<center>貴様が キュレクス……。|我が祖にして 同等の能力をもつ個体。: You are Culex. My ancestor and equal in|ability...

274.<center>なんと ちっぽけな。|失望を 禁じ得ない……。: Oh, my... I can't help but be disappointed...

275.<center>なれど 貴様の存在を許したとあれば|雑音なき世界を到来させる さ: But if I allow you to exist, you will usher|in a world without noise, without...

276.「あわれな……。時見を通じ 幾度となく| 人間たちの闇を 直視し続けた果てに|: Pity... You've seen the darkness of humanity|so many times through your eyes that you've|become twisted...

277.「さわがしいキュ！ 安眠妨害っキュよ！: You're bothering me! You're disturbing my|sleep!

278.「キュキュキュキュ！？| 何が どうなってるキュ！？: Squeaky, squeaky! What the hell is going on?

282.<center>なれど 時見すらできぬ 未熟な個体など|手を下すに 値せず。: But I'm not about to let an immature specimen|that can't even see the time...

283.<center>我こそは 唯一無二の 時の支配者。|ならぶ者なき 究極の存在。: I am the one and only... The ultimate...

285.「もう 間にあわないキュレ……| それより 小さき者よ……私のそばに……。: There's not enough time, Curé... Come, little|one... Stay with me...

286.「ボクのことは キュルルと呼ぶキュ。| ……お前を見てると モヤモヤするんだけど: You can call me Curle... I'm... I can't stop|looking at you. You're making me nervous. Who|the hell are you?

287.「その様子だと……私のことはおろか| 自分が何者かも 理解していないキュレね。|: By the looks of it... You don't even know who|you are, let alone who I am. Now, take my|hand... Curé...

288.「なるほど……お前もまた| 私のチカラの源から 分化した存在……。: I see... You, too, have diverged from the|source of my power.

289.「それって 親子みたいなものキュ？: Is that like a father and son thing?

290.「親子という概念には 当てはまらないキュレ。| 私たちは 同一にして 異質なる存:
The concept of parent and child does not|apply to us. We are one and the same, but|different. An alien life form that wanders|
|between time and space...

291.「もう 時間がないキュレ……。| キュルル……お前に 私の……| 知識と能力のす: We're running out of time, Curé... Curlew...|I give you my... All of my knowledge and|abilities...

292.「キュキュキュ！？| これは……この膨大な知識は……？: Kyu Kyu! This is... This vast amount of|knowledge...?

293.「……おかしいキュ。| む…胸が……胸が 苦しいキュ！| シクシクと 痛みが 消: ... Funny... Mmm... My chest... My chest, it|hurts! I can't get rid of the stinging...

294.「……彼の死を 悲しいと感じてるからよ。| あなたにとって キュレクスさんが|: ... I know you feel sad about his death. It's|a testament to how special Mr. Curlew was to|you.

295.「たった今 出会ったばかりの相手に| 調子を狂わされるなんて 理解不能キュ。|: I don't understand how someone you just met|can throw you off your game. I'm gonna change|my mind as soon as I can.

296.「アイツから 受け取った知識に 永久時環の| 起動のしかたがあったキュ！ 隕石落:
The knowledge he gave me was how to activate|the perpetual time ring. If you want to avoid|the future meteorite fall, you better|
|hurry...

297.「……わかったわ。王都の広場にある| 永久時環を 動かしにいきましょう。: ... I don't know... I'm going to move the|perpetual motion ring in King's Landing...

298.「メレアーデよ お前が 資格者の証を| 身につける必要があるキュレ。お前からは|: You must wear the badge of honor, Mereade. I|sense the blood of Retrius most strongly in|you.

299.「水没する未来を 回避したことによって| より 大きな災厄が おそってくるキュレ: By avoiding a future of submersion, you're|setting yourself up for a much greater|disaster.
